entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
